Primer današnjoj omladini
Veteran potpisao ugovor do kraja sezone

04 Nov 2019

Geret Beri je neuništiv!
Engelski veteran i rekorder Premijer lige po broju odigranih mečeva (653) je danas potpisao ugovor do kraja sezone sa drugoligašem Vest Bromvič Albionom.
Beri je i u prethodne dve sezone nosio dres VBA, ali je letos saradnja morala da se okonča. VBA i Everton su bili u sporu oko isplate Berijevog transfera sa Gudisona pre dve godine. VBA nije isplatio dogovorenu sumu i zato je Beriju bilo onemogućeno da se registruje i igra za Vest Brom na početku ove sezone. Konačno, dva kluba su prethodnih dana pronašli kompromis i potpisali dogovor koji je značio zeleno svetlo za engleskog veterana.
Beri će u februaru napuniti 39 godina, ali prema mnogih fizičkim testovima i merenjima, njegovi rezultati su impresivni i na nivou igrača od 20 i kusur godina.„On je sjajan primer i neko na koga današnji klinci treba da se ugledaju. Sva ta deca koja misle da će uspeti brzo i lako, bez mnogo uloženog truda, bi trebalo da prate Berijev primer. Ima ogromno iskustvo, veliki kvalitet, igrao je velike utakmice i zato smo želeli produžimo ugovor. Nemam reči kojima bih opisao njegovu želju na treninzima. Igrač sa takvom karijerom i u tim godinama... “, rekao je trener Slaven Bilić.
Beri je na kraju prošle sezone imao tešku povredu kolena, ali je mimo svih očekivanja uspeo da se oporavi i vrati fudbalu.„Povrediti koleno tako teško u njegovim godinama i onda raditi po nekoliko sati svakodnevno u teretani, može samo vrhunski profesionalac poput njega. Već trenira sa nama i u dobrom je stanju. Biće mu potrebne dve ili tri utakmice sa rezervnim timom da dostigne punu formu, ali ne sedam ili osam mečeva kako to obično biva kod ostalih igrača kada se vrate posle ovakve povrede“, rekao je Bilić.
Beri je u Premijer ligi debitovao 1998. godine kao igrač Aston Vile u kojoj je postao kapiten i lider tima. Odigrao je 441 meč i postigao 52 gola za 12 sezona na Vila Parku. Sa 19 godina je debitovao za reprezentaciju Engleske i bio njen član punih 12 godina. Iz Vile je prešao u Mančester Siti za koji je igrao četiri godine, da bi potom isto toliko proveo u Evertonu.
Kada je posle četiri sezone na Gudisonu u kojima je bio starter izgubio mesto standardnog prvotimca, dobio je poziv Vest Broma i odlučio da ga prihvati. Lako se izborio za mesto startera, a ostao je u klubu i posle ispadanja u Čempionšip.
Beri nikada nije važio za nekog fudbalskog majstora, ali je bio jedan od onih zahvalnih igrača koje treneri obožavaju. Nije birao uloge na terenu, radio je ono što se od njega traži, pa i preko toga. Nikada za 20 i kusur godina karijere nije napravio nikakav skandal, vodio je skroman i pristojan privatni život i bio poštovan od strane navijača i protivnika. Osim debitantske sezone na Vila Parku kada je kao tinejdžer odigrao samo dva prvenstvena meč i osetio barut Premijer lige, samo jednom u narednih 19 sezona igrajući za Aston Vilu, Mančester Siti i Everton je odigrao manje od 30 utakmica u sezoni.
Mnogi su mislili da ga je povreda na kraju prošle sezone zaustavila i da je došao do kraja karijere, ali je čeličnom voljom i velikim profesinalizmom uspeo da se vrati na teren i biće od velike koristi Vest Bromu u borbi za povratak u Premijer ligu.

An example to today's youth
The veteran signed a contract by the end of the season

04 Nov 2019

Geret Barry is indestructible!
The England veteran and Premier League record-holder (653) has today signed a contract for the end of the season with second-placed West Bromwich Albion.
Barry has also worn a VBA jersey the previous two seasons, but this year the collaboration had to end. The WBA and Everton were in dispute over the payment of Berry's transfer from Goodison two years ago. The VBA did not pay the agreed amount and therefore Beria was prevented from registering and playing for West Brom at the start of this season. Finally, the two clubs had found a compromise in the previous days and signed a deal that meant a green light for the English veteran.
Barry will turn 39 in February, but according to many physical tests and measurements, his results are impressive at the age of 20 and cusur players. All those children who think they will succeed quickly and easily, without much effort, should follow Berry's example. He has a lot of experience, great quality, he played big games and that's why we wanted to extend the contract. I have no words to describe his desire in training. A player with a career like that in those years ... ”, said coach Slaven Bilic.
Barry had a severe knee injury at the end of last season, but despite all expectations, he was able to recover and return to football. "To hurt a knee so hard at his age and then work a few hours every day at the gym, only a top professional like him can. He is already training with us and is in good shape. It will take two or three games with the reserve team to reach full form, but not seven or eight matches, as is usually the case with other players when they return after such an injury, "Bilic said.
Barry made his Premier League debut in 1998 as an Aston Villa player in which he became captain and team leader. He played 441 matches and scored 52 goals in 12 seasons at Vila Park. At the age of 19, he made his debut for the England national team and was a member for a full 12 years. He moved from Villa to Manchester City for which he played for four years and then spent the same amount of time in Everton.
When, after four seasons at Goodison in which he was a starter, he lost his place as standard champion, he received a call from West Brom and decided to accept him. He easily won the starter position and remained in the club after relegation to the Championship.
Barry was never considered a football major, but he was one of those grateful players the coaches adore. He did not choose roles in the field, he did what he was asked to do, even beyond that. He has never made any scandal in his 20-plus years of career, led a humble and decent private life and was respected by fans and opponents. Apart from his debut season at Vila Park when he played only two championship matches and felt the Premier League gunpowder as a teenager, only once in the next 19 seasons playing for Aston Villa, Manchester City and Everton played less than 30 games a season.
Many thought that the injury stopped him at the end of last season and that he was coming to the end of his career, but with steel will and great professionalism he was able to return to the field and would be of great help to West Brom in the fight to return to the Premier League.
